name: 黑曜世界
abstract: 黑曜世界是一款专为VR打造的动作节奏游戏，在游戏中你要根据节拍分节和射击，以击败来自其他世界的威胁。

detail.app_languages: Portuguese, Korean, Italian, French, Spanish, German, Japanese, English, Simplified Chinese
detail.app_release_note:
SolarBlack Update 1.45
New Songs:
- "Russian Dance" by Tchaikovsky
- "Romeo & Juliet" by Tchaikovsky
New Stages:
- Waves
- Dokholo Ga-Tsogwe
Gameplay Changes:
- Spatial Sounds for SaberGuns
- Improved Auto-aim
- Light Improvements
Performance Enhancements
- New Saber Trail
- Username Selection Prompt: Username selection displayed on startup if not yet set. On some platforms the username will be automatically set.
- Pause Menu Countdown: Countdown timer when returning from pause to play mode.
- New Modifier: Added the highly requested "No Obstacle" mode.
- Styled Selection Hub: Redesigned selection hub for a fresher start.
Fixed Bug:
- Resolved focus loss pausing issue.
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO Neo3 Pro, PICO Neo3, PICO Neo3 Eye, PICO 4, PICO 4 Pro, PICO 4 Ultra
